descriptions.ja: 車載電池の放電可能容量値1
descriptions.en: Dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 1

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の放電可能容量値2
descriptions.en: Dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 2

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の放電可能残容量1
descriptions.en: Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 1

note.ja: 車載電池の放電可能残容量1、車載電池の放電可能残容量3 は、電気自動車充放電器に接続された電気自動車から出力される場合、いずれかの搭載を必須とする。応答できない状況にある場合、不可応答を返す
note.en: The installation of 'Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 1' or 'Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 3' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger. Where no response can be returned, 'Response impossible' is returned.

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の放電可能残容量2
descriptions.en: Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 2

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の放電可能残容量3
descriptions.en: Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 3

note.ja: 車載電池の放電可能残容量1、車載電池の放電可能残容量3 は、電気自動車充放電器に接続された電気自動車から出力される場合、いずれかの搭載を必須とする。応答できない状況にある場合、不可応答を返す
note.en: The installation of 'Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 1' or 'Remaining dischargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery 3' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger. Where no response can be returned, 'Response impossible' is returned.

descriptions.ja: 車両接続・充放電可否状態
車両接続・充電不可・放電不可
車両接続・充電可・放電不可
車両接続・充電不可・放電可
車両接続・充電可・放電可
車両接続・充電可否不明

note.ja: 充放電器タイプのDC_タイプAA、DC_タイプBB、DC_タイプEE 及びDC_タイプFFは、IEC 62196-3 にて規定されているConfiguration AA、Configuration BB、Configuration EE 及びConfiguration FF に記載の形状のコネクタを有する電気自動車充放電器とする
note.en: DC_type AA, DC_type BB, DC_type EE and DC_type FF chargers/dischargers shall be electric vehicle chargers/dischargers with connectors of the shape specified in Configuration AA, Configuration BB, Configuration EE and Configuration FF as defined in IEC 62196-3.

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の充電可能容量値
descriptions.en: Chargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery

note.ja: 車載電池の充電可能容量値、車載電池の充電可能残容量値は電気自動車充放電器に接続された電気自動車から出力される場合、搭載を必須とする
note.en: The installation of 'chargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery' and 'chargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger.

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の充電可能残容量値

note.ja: 車載電池の充電可能容量値、車載電池の充電可能残容量値は電気自動車充放電器に接続された電気自動車から出力される場合、搭載を必須とする
note.en: The installation of 'chargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery' and 'chargeable capacity of vehicle mounted battery' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger.

descriptions.ja: 車載電池の使用容量値1
descriptions.en: Used capacity of vehicle mounted battery 1

note.ja: 車載電池の使用容量値1 は、電気自動車充放電器に接続された電気自動車から出力される場合、搭載を必須とする。応答できない状況にある場合、不可応答を返す
note.en: The installation of 'Used capacity of vehicle mounted battery 1' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger. Where no response can be returned, 'Response impossible' is returned.

note.en: The installation of 'Remaining stored electricity of vehicle mounted battery 1' or 'Remaining stored electricity of vehicle mounted battery 3' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger. note.en: The installation of 'Remaining stored electricity of vehicle mounted battery 1' or 'Remaining stored electricity of vehicle mounted battery 3' is mandatory in case of output from an electric vehicle connected to an electric vehicle charger/discharger. Where no response can be returned, 'Response impossible' is returned.

note.ja: 充電量設定値1 (または2)を使用する場合は充電量設定値2 (または1)を使用しない。0は未設定とする
note.en: When 'Charging amount setting 1 (or 2)' is used, 'Charging amount setting 2 (or 1)' shall not be used. 0 shall be 'not set'.

note.ja: 充電量設定値1 (または2)を使用する場合は充電量設定値2 (または1)を使用しない。0は未設定とする
note.en: When 'Charging amount setting 1 (or 2)' is used, 'Charging amount setting 2 (or 1)' shall not be used. 0 shall be 'not set'.

note.en: 0 shall be 'not set'.

descriptions.ja: 低圧スマート電力量メータ
積算電力量計測値 (正方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Measured cumulative amount of electric energy (normal direction)

note.ja: EPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 積算電力量計測値履歴1 (正方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy 1 (normal direction)
Day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved
Measured cumulative amounts of electric energy

note.ja: Queryは履歴収集日。電力量はEPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: Query is Day for collection. Electric power is multipled by EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 積算電力量計測値 (逆方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Measured cumulative amount of electric energy (reverse direction)

note.ja: EPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 積算電力量計測値履歴1 (逆方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy 1 (reverse direction)

Measured cumulative amounts of electric energy

note.ja: Queryは履歴収集日。電力量はEPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: Query is Day for collection. Electric power is multipled by EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 定時積算電力量計測値 (正方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Cumulative amounts of electric energy measured at fixed time (normal direction)
Cumulative amounts of electric energy measured

note.ja: EPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 定時積算電力量計測値 (逆方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Cumulative amounts of electric energy measured at fixed time (reverse direction)
Cumulative amounts of electric energy measured

note.ja: EPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 積算電力量計測値履歴2 (正方向、逆方向計測値)
descriptions.en: Historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy 2 (normal and reverse directions)
Date and time for which the historical data is to be retrieved
Measured cumulative amounts of electric energy

note.ja: Queryは日時と収集コマ数。秒の値は0、分の値は0または30。電力量はEPC=0xD3, 0xE1の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: Query is data&time and Number of collection segments. Value of seconds is 0 and value of minutes is 0 or 30. Electric energy is multipled by EPC=0xD3 and 0xE1.

descriptions.ja: 高圧スマート電力量メータ

note.ja: EPC=0xC5, 0xD3, 0xD4 の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xC5, 0xD3 and 0xD4.

note.ja: EPC=0xC7, 0xD3, 0xD4 の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xC7, 0xD3 and 0xD4.

descriptions.ja: 定時需要電力 (30分平均電力)
descriptions.en: Electric power demand at fixed time (30-minute average electric power)

note.ja: EPC=0xC5, 0xD3, 0xD4 の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xC5, 0xD3 and 0xD4.

descriptions.en: Historical data of measured electric power demand
Day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved

note.ja: Queryは履歴収集日。電力はEPC=0xC5, 0xD3, 0xD4 の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: Query is Day for collection. Electric power is multipled by the value of EPC=0xC5, 0xD3 and 0xD4.

note.ja: EPC=0xCD, 0xD3, 0xD4 の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: The value is multipled by the value of EPC=0xCD, 0xD3 and 0xD4.

note.ja: EPC=0xD3, 0xD4, 0xE6の値を乗算した値である

note.ja: Queryは履歴収集日。電力量はEPC=0xD3, 0xD4, 0xE6 の値を乗算済みの値
note.en: Query is Day for collection. Electric power is multipled by the value of EPC=0xD3, 0xD4 and 0xE6.

note.ja: 実行電圧値をVで示す。本プロパティは、計測定格電圧値として固定値で実装してもよい
note.en: This property indicates effective voltage value in volts. This property may be implemeented as a fixed value of the rated voltage of measurement.

note.ja: 本プロパティは、固定値として実装してもよい
note.en: This property may be implemeented as a fixed value.

descriptions.ja: デイリータイマー設定

note.ja: 最大2種のタイマー使用可能
note.en: Up to 2 kinds of timer can be used

descriptions.ja: デイリータイマー1設定

note.ja: 24時間を30分単位で分割、全6バイトを割り当て、各bit 1:運転、0:停止
note.en: Set the time in the unit of 30 minutes, dividing 24 hours by 30 minutes and allocated 6 bytes. Each bit 1: worked 0: stopped.

descriptions.ja: デイリータイマー2設定

note.ja: 24時間を30分単位で分割、全6バイトを割り当て、各bit 1:運転、0:停止
note.en: Set the time in the unit of 30 minutes, dividing 24 hours by 30 minutes and allocated 6 bytes. Each bit 1: worked 0: stopped.

descriptions.en: Rated power consumption of cooler (cold water) mode in watts

note.ja: 暖房(温水) : 冷房(冷水)
note.en: Heater (hot water) : cooler (cold water)
